title: GROW lettuce at home | How to grow lettuce at home

subtasks: Cut the lettuce head 5 centimeters from the base using a knife
Save the remaining lettuce for consumption
Prepare a jar by filling it with water
Secure the lettuce base in the jar using toothpicks
Place the jar in a sunny location for optimal growth
Change the water every 1-2 days to maintain cleanliness
Monitor the growth of the lettuce every 3 weeks for harvest
Harvest the lettuce leaves when they are big and green for best flavor
Transplant the lettuce into soil for continued growth (optional but described in the video)
Water the transplanted lettuce and ensure soil moisture
